MAIN.TITLE: Sandwidch Request Modifier
MAIN.HEADER_DESC: customize header，with key value pairs (key:value)，separate multiple key-value pairs with new lines
MAIN.GET_DESC: customize GET Parameter, with key value pairs (key=value)，separate multiple key-value pairs with new lines
MAIN.KEYWORDS_DESC: Scope keywords, separated by small commas, for example "helloworld,abc,xyz.com"
MAIN.NO_EMPTY: The use case name must not be empty!
MAIN.NEW_USE_CASE: The current use case is not empty. do you want to save it ?
MAIN.NEW_USE_CASE_NAME: Enter a new use case name
